intro: Danais cernua, commonly known as the slender danais, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of South America. It belongs to the Apocynaceae family, which includes many species with showy flowers and milky sap. The plant is characterized by its delicate, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pale yellow. Its leaves are typically narrow and opposite, contributing to its overall graceful appearance. Danais cernua is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests or along stream banks.
